data.title: Leonard Susskind - The Black Hole War
data.meta_description: Leonard Susskind - The Black Hole War - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. "Susskind does a masterful job of translating the incredible complexity of general relativity, quantum physics, string theory, and black hole theory" "the reader has gotten some rather entertaining insights into the world of physics and a very nice grounding in the science" "this is your universe on acid. Susskind shares Richard Peynman's gift for spinning fascinating anecdotes"
